resources.string: Press the back button to play Ant Smasher!
Your game time has ended. Buy any product to get more time!
In Baby Mode, press HOME to quit
The highscores board has been reset!
Would you like to turn on Kids Mode?
Would you like to turn on Fun Mode?
Would you like to turn on Baby Mode?
Would you like to buy the Deluxe Pack?
This option removes all Ads from gameplay.
In Kids Mode the ants are slower and the game is easier. Also, when you touch a bee you will lose only one life instead of directly losing the game.
In Fun Mode when you touch a bee you will lose only one life instead of directly losing the game.
"In Baby Mode you don't ever lose the game! This is the perfect distraction for your little one!"
Game Over Protection will give you one more chance when you are about to lose the game.
Increase the maximum number of lives from three to four!
Increase the maximum number of lives from three to five!
Increase the maximum number of lives from four to five!
This unlocks all content in the game!
To access Kids Mode tap the Kids button in the play menu!
To access Fun Mode tap the Fun button in the play menu!
To access Baby Mode tap the Baby button in the play menu!
"From now on you won't be seeing anymore ads!"
The maximum number of lives you can have has now been increased to four! However, you still begin with two.
The maximum number of lives you can have has now been increased to five! However, you still begin with two.
You will have one more chance when you are about to lose the game! You can enable or disable this at anytime in the Options menu.
The maximum number of lives you can have has now been increased to five! However, you still begin with two.
All features enabled: No ads, five maximum lives, game over protection, Kids Mode, Fun Mode and Baby Mode enabled.
I smashed %d ants on #AntSmasher, a FREE Android and iPhone Game! Beat that!!! http://bit.ly/antsmasher
I smashed %d ants in Ant Smasher!
You are leaving without sending any info. Would you allow us to ask you again in the future?
Why do we want to know about you?

"In accordance with our Privacy Policy (available at http://www.bestcoolfungames.com/bcfg/contracts/BcfgPrivacyPolicy.html) your information is kept confidential and anonymous. We only ask these questions to help us make our future games more relevant to you. If you still don't want to answer, please press the back button."
